original_text: On the day that I come to punish them, people will not sing in the temple. Instead they will weep loudly. There will be dead bodies everywhere. Be quiet now!’ That is what the Lord God says.
korean_text: 그 날에 궁전의 노래가 애곡으로 변할 것이며 곳곳에 시체가 많아서 사람이 잠잠히 그 시체들을 내어버리리라 주 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: On the day that I come to punish them
people will not sing in the temple
There will be dead bodies everywhere
That is what the Lord God says
